mapper.select: select prmprcage, prmpragen, prmprfreg, gbagendid, case when gbdacnomb is null then '' else trim(gbdacnomb) end || ' ' || case when gbdacape1 is null then '' else trim(gbdacape1) end || ' ' || case when gbdacape2 is null then '' else trim(gbdacape2) end || ' ' || case when gbdacape3 is null then '' else trim(gbdacape3) end as gbagenomb, gbageeciv, gbagesexo, case when gbagedir1 is null then '' else gbagedir1 end || ' ' || case when gbagedir2 is null then '' else gbagedir2 end as gbagedir, prmprnpre, prmprcmon, prmprmapt as prmprmdes, prmprplzo / 30 AS prmprplzo, prmprppgk, prmprdiap , case when prmprtsex is null then prtsatbas else prtsasprd end as prtsatbas , case when prtsasprd is null then 0 else prtsasprd end as prtsasprd, case when prmprlncr is null then 0 else prmprlncr end as prmprlncr, case when lcmlcsprd is null then 0 else lcmlcsprd end as lcmlcsprd, case when lcmlctasa is null then 0 else lcmlctasa end as lcmlctasa, case when lcmlcplzo is null then 0 else lcmlcplzo end as lcmlcplzo, case when lcmlcmapr is null then 0 else lcmlcmapr end as lcmlcmapr from gbdac inner join prmpr on (prmprcage = gbdaccage) inner join gbage on (gbdaccage = gbagecage) left join prtsa on (prmprnpre = prtsanpre) left join lcmlc on (prmprlncr = lcmlcnrlc) where prmprnpre = #{prmprnpre} and prtsafvig = (select MAX(prtsafvig) from prtsa where prtsanpre = #{prmprnpre})
